thread.title: See the moment Tom Brady realized his jersey was gone
thread.title_full: See the moment Tom Brady realized his jersey was gone

title: See the moment Tom Brady realized his jersey was gone
text:
See the moment Tom Brady realized his jersey was gone "I put it in my bag." Post to Facebook See the moment Tom Brady realized his jersey was gone "I put it in my bag."  //ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/tom-brady-jersey-new-england-patriots-super-bowl-51-stolen-missing-nfl/   Join the Nation's Conversation   See the moment Tom Brady realized his jersey was gone Andrew Joseph 6:17 p.m. ET Feb. 7, 2017 
Screenshot (Photo: Twitter) 
Through the aftermath of the New England Patriots' epic Super Bowl 51 win, Tom Brady's jersey went missing . 
This jersey, which could be worth upwards of $1 million , has turned into the subject of a massive search. When Brady returned to his locker on Sunday, he couldn't believe his jersey wasn't in the bag he swore he placed it in. He searched frantically for the jersey around his locker but couldn't find it. â€” Alan Springer (@AlanSpringer) February 6, 2017 
Brady could be heard saying, "I put it in my bag. I absolutely 100 percent put it in my bag." As security was discussing what Brady did with the jersey after the game, Brady added, "Someone took it." 
More about the search for Brady's jersey from USA TODAY Sports . Read or Share this story: http://ftw.usatoday.com/2017/02/tom-brady-jersey-new-england-patriots-super-bowl-51-stolen-missing-nfl/ Most Popular
